body_html:
Hi, I faced same problem when I tried to run the command on Jetson TX2 by following this instruction.

But when I changed the parameter of command from 3072 to 1800 by following another instruction, it worked well :)

The root cause may be ran out of memory.
body_text:
Hi, I faced same problem when I tried to run the command on Jetson TX2 by following this instruction.
But when I changed the parameter of command from 3072 to 1800 by following another instruction, it worked well :)
The root cause may be ran out of memory.
body:
Hi, I faced same problem when I tried to run the command on Jetson TX2 by following [this instruction](https://syed-ahmed.gitbooks.io/nvidia-jetson-tx2-recipes/content/first-question.html).

But when I changed the parameter of command from 3072 to 1800 by following [another instruction](https://github.com/dat-ai/tensorflow-on-nvidia-jetson/blob/master/build_from_source.md), it worked well :)

The root cause may be ran out of memory.
